item.description:
Come join us for a fun night of Salsa dancing at Havana Club. Havana is a great place to learn and dance Salsa. There will be beginner and intermediate salsa lessons from 9:00 -10:00. We could then dance as much as we want till 1:00 AM.
No prior experience is required


Where:
Havana Club
288 Green St
Central Sq
Cambridge, MA
617.312.5550


When:
October 8, 2010, 9PM â€“ 1AM
Will meet oudside (in front of the entrance) of the club at 8:45PM.
My phone no, is (617) 299-6099 in case you need.
Please try not to be late.



Cost: $12 (Cover Charge)[Includes 1 hour of lesson]


About Friday Night Salsa @ Havana
Friday Night Salsa is Boston's salsa hot spot featuring salsa dancing and lessons with Salsa y Control, regular performances, and an amazing venue filled with 300+ welcoming salsa dancers. Friday Night Salsa has it all, including: a 5400 square foot ballroom, a raised performance stage, club lighting and sound, a reasonably priced full bar ($4-5 beer, $5-7 mixed drink, etc), an inexpensive parking garage next door, and public transport on Mass Ave. (Red Line, Buses 1, 64 etc.) one block away!



Direction:
Driving Direction
Take Storrow or Memorial Drive to River St. (where the two gas stations are), then a right on Mass Ave, a right on Pearl St (where FootLocker and Putnam Furniture is), and your first right on Green St.

Walking Direction:
From Mass Ave take a left on Prospect St then a left on Green St. It is a one minute walk.


Parking:
There is a large, inexpensive ($1/hr)parking garage right next door - you can't miss it!


Please email us your suggestions, comments and concerns at feedback@inquisitiveminds.org
item.how_to_find_us: Will meet oudside (in front of the entrance) of the club at 8:45PM. My phone no, is (617) 299-6099 in case you need.
item.name: Salsa Dancing @ Havana Club
